Scenario: Check item total cost and tax # src/test/resources/features/UI-Test.feature:4 Navigated to home page: https://www.saucedemo.com/ Given I am on the home page # stepdefinitions.UIStepDefination.i_am_on_the_home_page() And I login in with the following details # stepdefinitions.UIStepDefination.i_login_in_with_the_following_details(io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) | userName | Password | | standard_user | secret_sauce | And I add the following items to the basket # stepdefinitions.UIStepDefination.i_add_the_following_items_to_the_basket(io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) | Sauce Labs Backpack | | Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket | | Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt | | Sauce Labs Onesie | And I should see 4 items added to the shopping cart # stepdefinitions.UIStepDefination.i_should_see_items_added_to_the_shopping_cart(int) java.lang.AssertionError: expected [1] but found [4] at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:110) at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:1413) at org.testng.Assert.assertEqualsImpl(Assert.java:149) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:131) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:1240) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:1274) at stepdefinitions.UIStepDefination.i_should_see_items_added_to_the_shopping_cart(UIStepDefination.java:70) at ✽.I should see 4 items added to the shopping cart(file:///C:/Users/acer/Downloads/QumuQaTask/QumuQaTask/src/test/resources/features/UI-Test.feature:14)
And I click on the shopping cart # stepdefinitions.UIStepDefination.i_click_on_the_shopping_cart() And I verify that the QTY count for each item should be 1 # stepdefinitions.UIStepDefination.i_verify_that_the_qty_count_for_each_item_should_be(int) And I remove the following item: # stepdefinitions.UIStepDefination.i_remove_the_following_item(io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) | Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket | And I should see 3 items added to the shopping cart # stepdefinitions.UIStepDefination.i_should_see_items_added_to_the_shopping_cart(int) And I click on the CHECKOUT button # stepdefinitions.UIStepDefination.i_click_on_the_checkout_button() And I type "FirstName" for First Name # stepdefinitions.UIStepDefination.i_type_for_first_name(java.lang.String) And I type "LastName" for Last Name # stepdefinitions.UIStepDefination.i_type_for_last_name(java.lang.String) And I type "EC1A 9JU" for ZIP/Postal Code # stepdefinitions.UIStepDefination.i_type_for_zip_postal_code(java.lang.String) When I click on the CONTINUE button # stepdefinitions.UIStepDefination.i_click_on_the_continue_button() Then Item total will be equal to the total of items on the list # stepdefinitions.UIStepDefination.item_total_will_be_equal_to_the_total_of_items_on_the_list() And a Tax rate of 8 % is applied to the total # stepdefinitions.UIStepDefination.a_tax_rate_of_is_applied_to_the_total(java.lang.Integer)
